homepage.description: Ocean Swap Bridge is a bridge crossing multiple block chains based AMM swap. Anyone can be elected to become Validator of ODT. Validators are responsible of supplying essential cross-chain relay validation data continuously and earn ODT tokens. Users are able to send transaction of cross-chain swap request and get wished token on target chain if price fits. Data safety is guaranteed via OSB and Swap Request safety is guaranteed via AMM Slippage.
homepage.lockInfo: Except for the tokens produced by liquid mining, the rest will not enter the market within one week of liquid mining. All addresses are publicized and subject to community supervision.
homepage.fairNote: Ocean Team doesnâ€™t hold The ODT token
homepage.oceanDaoInfo: Awesome platform for initial dex offering. Safe, easy and fully decentralized.
homepage.oceanSwapInfo: Amazing cross-chain AMM swap. Smoothly exchange your tokens between chains.
homepage.oceanLabInfo: Brilliant foundation of filtering, investing and hatching qualified project onto OceanDao.

boardroom.description: Deposit BBC Shares and earn inflationary rewards

mining.title: Ocean Mining
mining.description: OCEAN is our platform equity Token. OCEAN holders can enjoy the income dividends brought by the entire platform ecology in the future. Users can minig OCEAN by staking OCEAN-LP. Unstake any time, and the income is released every second.

safe.title: Ocean Safe
safe.description: Ocean Safe uses decentralized insurance mechanism through the HECO chain, and uses smart contracts to allow all DEFI users to share the risk evenly and protect their mortgage assets on the chain without any third-party centralized insurance company.

nft.title: Ocean NFT
nft.description: The Ocean NFT collection will invite famous designers from all over the world to our platform, and regularly present rich and excellent cards with artistic collection value.

swap.title: OceanSwap
swap.description: We will build the first AMM-based Swap decentralized transaction on the HECO chain. At the same time, the exchange will have the function of cross-chain Swap, allowing users to use ERC20, TRC20 and other cross-chain assets.
